description.narrative: By 2016, key policies and strategies necessary for responding to emergency and scale up of high impact integrated interventions are coordinated, strengthened and implemented in functioning Health District/Prefecture (2012-2014) Effective and efficient programme management, supply, logistics and operational support to programme delivery)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016, key policies and strategies necessary for responding to emergency and scale up of high impact integrated interventions are coordinated, strengthened and implemented in functioning Health District/Prefecture (2012-2014) Effective and efficient programme management, supply, logistics and operational support to programme delivery)

description.narrative: The strategic humanitarian response reached 152,351 children living in IDP sites with essential health care services in the most affected areas. The joint Initiative for the Reduction of Maternal, New-born, Child and Adolescent Mortality increased the coordination of strategic interventions focused on mother and child. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2018

actual.value: 2015:The CAR Health Transition Plan 2014 -2016 elaborated and validated with contribution from the CSD
2015:The National iCCM Strategy Plan 2015-2017 was developed.
